sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-app-bar class="custom-header" dense>
      <v-container class="d-flex justify-center">
        <v-row align="center" justify="center" class="custom-header-inner">
          <!-- Login -->
          <v-col cols="auto">
            <v-form ref="loginForm" v-model="isValid" class="d-flex align-center">
              <v-text-field v-model="matricula" label="Matrícula" placeholder="Matrícula" :rules="[rules.required]" outlined dense class="mr-2"></v-text-field>
              <v-text-field v-model="senha" label="Senha" type="password" placeholder="Senha" :rules="[rules.required]" outlined dense class="mr-2"></v-text-field>
              <v-btn :disabled="!isValid" @click="login" color="secondary" class="mt-3">Entrar</v-btn>
            </v-form>
          </v-col>
        </v-row>
      </v-container>
    </v-app-bar>
  </template>
  
  <script>
  export default {
    data() {
      return {
        matricula: '',
        senha: '',
        isValid: false,
        rules: {
          required: (value) => !!value || 'Este campo é obrigatório',
        },
      };
    },
    methods: {
      login() {
        // Lógica de login aqui
        console.log('Login acionado');
      },
    },
  };
  </script>
  
  <style scoped>
  .custom-header {
    background-color: #036116;
    max-width: 100%;
    padding: 10px 0;
  }
  
  .custom-header-inner {
    max-width: 800px; /* Largura fixa para centralizar o conteúdo */
  }
  </style>
